title: Lemon cupcakes
ingredients: ['For the lemon cupcakes', '225g margarine', '225g caster sugar', '2 lemons, zested and juiced, divided', '4 large eggs, beaten', '225g self raising flour', '1 dessertspoon icing sugar', 'For the lemon icing', '540g icing sugar', '200g margarine', '1 tablespoon lemon juice']
